response.overview: SHOCK â€“ Election-based situation  where it turns into A Tale of Exam Madness & Unexpected Twists In the high-pressure world of college exams, where stress and sleep run low, SHOCK follows the journey of Nithin, a laid-back student navigating the chaos of last-minute preparations. While his studious peers burn the midnight oil, he stumbles upon an extraordinary discovery that could change his fate forever.  What starts as a relatable story of exam struggles quickly spirals into an unpredictable rollercoaster, blending humor, suspense, and mind-bending twists. With hilarious moments, shocking turns, and an electrifying climax, SHOCK explores the fine line between luck, effort, and destiny.  Are grades truly earned, or is there another way to ace the system? Watch SHOCK to uncover the truth!
response.tagline: It is the short film"SHOCK" directed by me in YOUTUBE ,channel name is KNS PRESENTS
response.title: SHOCK
